author: lundblad
msg: Fix issue #2509: add a --force option to svn blame, to ignore whether the file
is binary and produce blame information anyway.
option.  (This API was already revised in 1.4.)
(svn_client_blame2): Add info on new argument to docstring.
(file_rev_handler, old_blame): Only check the MIME type if ignore_mime_type
(svn_client_blame3): Add new ignore_mime_type parameter and initialize the
(svn_client_blame2): Add argument to call of wrapped function.
* subversion/svn/main.c (svn_cl__cmd_table): Add --force to the blame command.

author: rooneg
msg: Remove data types that are not actually used in libsvn_fs_fs.
rep_delta_chunk_t, copy_t): Removed, these are apparently holdovers
from the original bdb based filesystem code.

author: lundblad
msg: Add private copy of zlib's compressBound function to avoid missing
function issues on systems using zlib 1.1.x

author: pburba
msg: This is one of several patches to allow Subversion to run on IBM's
OS400 V5R4.  It uses the OS400 specific function apr_utime() instead
of apr_file_mtime_set(), which is not implemented on OS400 APR.
